summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5951 for the improvement of Hanford Street from 6th Avenue South to Airport Way; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 79262, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
